text: Carmela Corren (; February 13, 1938 - January 16, 2022) was an Israeli- Austrian singer and actress. She was born in Tel Aviv, Israel. She represented Austria at the 1963 Eurovision Song Contest with the song "Vielleicht geschieht ein Wunder". An actress, she appeared in Between Shanghai and St. Pauli (1962), His Best Friend (1962) and Don't Fool with Me (1963). Corren died on January 16, 2022 at her home in London, England at the age of 83.Eurovision 1963 Participant Carmela Corren Has Died ==References== ==Other websites== * Homepage of Carmela Corren (German) * Austrian Song Contest Fanclub (German) * Deutsche Schlagerfestspiele (German) * IMDB profile (English) Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Israeli movie actors Category:Austrian movie actors Category:Austrian singers Category:Singers from Tel Aviv Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Actors from Tel Aviv
